snippet.title: Illusion Box - Reveal - Trailer | TGS 2024
snippet.description:
"Illusion Box" is the first virtual reality entertainment project of the 21st century. However, malicious rumors and computer virus infections forced the company to shut down the project. Now, the long-abandoned "Illusion Box" devices are being reactivated...
Steam Store Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3109800/Illusion_Box/

#gaming #indiegame #games
